entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 p.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -18.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -20.7°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
